meanings.definition: To waste time or effort on trivial matters.
meanings.sent1: She futzes around with her phone all day instead of studying.
meanings.sent2: He always futzes with his hair when he's nervous.
meanings.sent3: Grandpa futzes with his crossword puzzle for hours, never finishing it.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic futzes with the engine, trying to figure out the problem.
meanings.sent5: The child futzes with the toy, exploring every button and feature.

meanings.definition: To handle something in a clumsy or ineffective way.
meanings.sent1: She futzes with the jar lid, unable to open it.
meanings.sent2: He futzes with the remote control, accidentally changing the channel.
meanings.sent3: The chef futzes with the recipe, adding too much salt by mistake.
meanings.sent4: The toddler futzes with the puzzle pieces, struggling to fit them together.
meanings.sent5: The student futzes with the project, making a mess of it.
